net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.blocks.fuzzy

Class TriangularMembershipFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.exprtree.fun.AbstractPrimitive
      • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.blocks.fuzzy.MembershipFunction
        • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.blocks.fuzzy.TriangularMembershipFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.exprtree.IPrimitive

    public class TriangularMembershipFunction
extends MembershipFunction
    Implementation of a triangular membership function. It considers the interval domain, the set of labels available, and the actual set of labels in use for a particular instance of the triangular function. The main method is compatibilityDegree() which checks the compatibility degree of an attribute value with the membership function.
    Author:
    Alberto Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
